config.trident.debug.description: Options dedicated for the development of Trident.
config.trident.debug.enable_logging.name: Enable Developer Mode
config.trident.debug.enable_logging.desc: §cIntended for developers§r. Displays a bunch of useful information in logs and enables extra features for debugging
config.trident.debug.draw_slot_number.de: Draws slot's index in it's top left corner
config.trident.debug.bypass_on_island.de:
Allows to use MCCI-specific features on other servers and singleplayer 

§cWARNING: Things might crash or not work, this is intended for development, use on your own risk.
config.trident.global.name: Global Settings
config.trident.global.description: Universal non-game specific settings that apply across MCC Island.
config.trident.global.call_to_home.name: Use Trident's Web Service
config.trident.global.call_to_home.descr:
Trident includes a few optional online features to improve functionality and ease of use.

§bNo personal data is ever collected, and you are completely safe to use Trident with or without Web Service enabled.§r

Disabling this option will disable these features:
- Island Exchange will require the use of your own API Token
config.trident.global.api_provider.name: API Provider
config.trident.global.api_provider.descr:
Provider of the API used by Trident. 

Currently supported providers:
§7∙§r Trident Web (default)
§7∙§r Token. §bRequires you to provide your own API key using the "/trident api" command.
config.trident.global.exchange_improveme: Shows an indicator on best priced listings and gives the ability to hide owned cosmetics. Requires API
config.trident.global.chat_channel_butto:
Shows buttons for switching between chat channels above the chat input.

§6Disabled if Island Utils is installed
config.trident.global.theme.name: Module theme
config.trident.global.theme.description: Changes the current theme that Modules are using.
config.trident.indicators.name: Blueprint Indicators
config.trident.indicators.description: Indicators for blueprint ownership and craft-ability.
config.trident.indicators.craftable_indi: Shows an indicator if a blueprint is not craftable (missing materials).
config.trident.indicators.blueprint_indi:
Displays icons based on blueprint's ownership status.

§7∙§r Tick Icon - Blueprint has maxed royal donations
§7∙§r Diamond icon - Blueprint is not owned by player
config.trident.rarity_slot.name: Rarity Overlay
config.trident.rarity_slot.description: Displays an overlay around the item in its slot, matching the item's rarity color.
config.trident.rarity_slot.enabled.name: Enabled
Changes the visual style of the overlay.
config.trident.fishing.name: Fishing Modules
config.trident.fishing.description: Modules that apply to the Fishing game
config.trident.fishing.supplies_module.d: Shows a window that displays your current Bait, Line durability, your equipped Augments, and your active Overclocks.
Shows a small number that represents the durability of each augment.
config.trident.fishing.flash_if_depleted: Makes Minecraft's taskbar/dock icon flash when your current spot depletes.
config.trident.fishing.island_indicators: Shows the current wind and tides on fishing island inside the Navigator menu.
Shows a window that displays your progress towards Grottos as well as any active Grotto's stabilities.
config.trident.fishing.show_augment_stat: Displays the status of your Augments (Broken, Needs repairing, Paused) in the Fishing Supplies menu on MCC Island.
config.trident.games.name: All Games
config.trident.games.description: Settings that apply to all games on MCC Island, except fishing
config.trident.games.auto_focus.name: Focus game on countdown
config.trident.games.auto_focus.descript: Automatically focuses Minecraft when your game is about to start.
config.trident.questing.name: Questing Module
config.trident.questing.description: Settings that apply to the Questing Module
config.trident.questing.enabled.name: Enabled
config.trident.questing.enabled.descript: Turns on the Questing Module to be shown in games with live-updating progress.
config.trident.questing.rarity_color_nam: When turned on, changes each quest's name color to match it's rarity.
config.trident.questing.show_in_lobby.de: When enabled, Questing module will show quests in game lobbies.
config.trident.questing.show_left.name: Show the remaining quest amount
config.trident.questing.show_left.descri: When enabled, shows how much daily/weekly quests you have remaining.
config.trident.questing.hide_if_no_quest: When enabled, hides the Questing Module in games if there are no quests.
config.trident.killfeed.name: Kill Feed
config.trident.killfeed.description: Options that apply to the in-game Kill Feed
config.trident.killfeed.enabled.name: Enable
config.trident.killfeed.enabled.descript:
Turns on the Kill Feed to be shown in games.

Currently shown in Battle Box, Sky Battle, Rocket Spleef Rush, and Dynaball.
config.trident.killfeed.hide_kills.name: Hide kill messages in chat
config.trident.killfeed.hide_kills.descr: When enabled, hides kill messages in the chat.
config.trident.killfeed.show_kill_streak:
When enabled, will show Kill Streaks §7(how many consecutive kills a person got)§r. 

Streaks reset at the start of each round.
config.trident.killfeed.position_side.de: Changes the side where the kill feed is located.
config.trident.killfeed.position_y.name: Vertical Offset
config.trident.killfeed.position_y.descr: Changes the offset of the killfeed on the vertical axis.
config.trident.killfeed.remove_kill_time:
Amount of time in seconds that needs to pass before the kill is removed.

§bSetting this to 0 will make the kills stay on screen permanently.
config.trident.killfeed.max_kills.name: Max Kills
config.trident.killfeed.max_kills.descri: The amount of kills that can be shown at once.
config.trident.killfeed.clear_after_roun: Clears the kill feed at the end of a round.
config.trident.killfeed.show_you_in_kill: When enabled, adds a §o(YOU)§r prefix to your kills.
config.trident.killfeed.reverse_order.de:
Reverses the order kills in the kill feed.

§o§7When enabled, kills come from the top instead of the bottom
trident.not_island: You are not currently playing on MCC Island
trident.failed_config: Trident has failed to load the config. Your settings have been reset. Please contact developers to fix this issue.
trident.dialog.update_cat.description: please update Trident. this cat represents developer's emotions when people are using outdated versions
trident.dialog.update_cat.buttons.no: no i hate you and your cat
trident.dialog.supplies.desynced.tooltip:
§6Module is not synced
§7Trident has detected that you've received bait, meaning your Supply Module is out of date. Please open your Supply menu to update it.
trident.dialog.supplies.missing_data.des: In order to update the Supplies Module, please open the Fishing Supplies menu.
trident.introduction:
Thank you for downloading Trident!

You can see the full list of features in the config by pressing %s, or by using Mod Menu.

§oHave fun playing on MCC Island!
